article:
The White House is an important historical building in the USA. It lies _ the country's capital. Many people expect _ see the palace with their own eyes.
We _ six months getting tickets to visit the White Hous _ I was _ with excitement while we were waiting in the White House South Lawns. The first thing _ interested me was the colorful flowers and green grass.
Everything inside and outside was _ kept in the white House. We went _ many security checks  _ entering the building. In the east hallway _ the first floor, I saw the pictures of past presidents on the walls. The _ had over 2700 books. The Vermeil Room and China Room showed different _ .
We walked upstairs to the State Floor. The East Room, the _ in the White House, was the most wonderful in its size and furniture. This is the room where the president usually _ the reporters. The Green, Blue and Red Rooms on the same floor got their names because of the 14 of the furniture and walls. These rooms are used for having parties for state guests.
